subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Heading into this season’s final week, the Yankees’ batting order and starting rotation is still a work in progress, but the defense is taking shape with the return of Hideki Matsui in left field.
snippet: Heading into this season’s final week, the Yankees’ batting order and starting rotation is still a work in progress, but the defense is taking shape with the return of Hideki Matsui in left field.
